name: Independent City
description:
This is a work in progress 

Hi! It's been several weeks since I teased you a personal project on my Twitter Account. The creation of an autonomous city on Unity.

I will give you more details here and also a demo that you'll be able to try. The project is still in progress with the next step being the management of moving cars.
Just a little bit of patience to have more content

Here are the elements availables in the current version to interact with the city :

Management of the number of inhabitants and their movements 

Speed of time management

Management of public light according to a time window
